ratings.comment: I've never enjoyed an academic music class before Music 211. Doctor Crook is one of those people who makes you want to know more just by talking to him. He is someone with so much knowledge, and so much passion, that it is infectious. And his online materials were perfect. Always made us feel prepared for the exams and lectures.
Great professor. Always ready to help students understand the material. Never belittling.

Dr. Crook is amazing! He is passionate about music history and he makes his lectures super interesting and engaging. He wants his students to succeed and goes above and beyond as a professor. Truly one of my favorites!
Typical of UW-Madison Music. Those who can, do. Those who cant, teach.

Professor Crook gives energetic lectures every class, and he is clearly passionate about the material he is teaching. He makes his grading criteria clear for every exam, and he really wants to see his students succeed. I highly recommend any class with Professor Crook.
Some of other professors simply teach knowledge, but professor Crook gives you an education.

This was an amazing class! The reading material was excellent, and Prof. Crook as awesome-informed, funny, passionate, and interested in us really learning something. If you can, take this class! It will intrinsically change the way you think about performance (and you'll find yourself using the word "issue" a lot, too).
Prof. Crook is my favorite academic professor so far. He is smart, hilarious, and engaging. If you have an opportunity to study with Crook, take it!

One of the best professors I have ever had. I have been out of his class for 16 years and I still think about the topics we discussed and quote some of the things he told us. I feel lucky to have had him for a prof.

Prof.Crook is a very nice man. Class attendance is not necessary but be careful, discussion is. The only thing that disappointed me in this class is the title of the course.  It should have said European Classical music experience because 99% of the class is on European classical music,not of any other country/ genre. Last 3 classes deal with jazz.

david crook is the greatest thing to ever happen to music history.  he has a hilarious sense of humor, is truly engaging in his lectures, and genuinely cares about his students.  great guy, great class.

Prof. Crook was my favorite professor last semester. He infuses his lectures with refreshing bits of humor, and he explains the history so well. If you study correctly and listen to the music, you'll do well.

Prof Crook was sincerely one of my favorite professors thus far.  I loved going to the lectures--they were extremely interesting and entertaining, yet still informative.  The tests are a fair test of knowledge of class material and the class is overall VERY fun!  YAY PROFESSOR CROOK.

He is very knowledgeable of both music history and his students. His grading is fair. The tests are very hard if one has not done the required reading/listening. Must study on a daily basis to get an A, but getting a B requires minimal studying. Lectures and reading/listening is a must. He is happy to help and very kind.

Looks European(Sorry, just a steorotype~I mean he looks cool, not funny)at the beginning, later I found he is interesting, fond of jazz, and sometimes dances in class. If go to the lecture most of the the time, pretty sure one won't find the exam be difficult.
Loved this class, looked forward to it every Tuesday and Thursday.  Seems flat at first, but is ridiculously funny and adds enjoyable commentary to songs.
Prof. Crook is one of my favorite professors, and I highly recommend anything he teaches.
Very funny.
Not the most interesting lecturer, but better than many of his colleagues.  Has a sense of humor and sometimes lets it show.
This professor is outstanding.  He is extremely knowledgeable and clear.  He is also very helpful.  I would highly recommend him.
Great prof. Very dry exterior at first, but I was mistaken-- very inquisitive and friendly, a fabulous teacher and scholar.
Professor Crook is easily the best college teacher I've ever had!
No Comments
Prof. Crook is awesome.  One of the best proffesors I've ever had.
